This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0564 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published
EA Edit/Adjudication ResponseEdit/Adjudication ResponsePayer adjustmentPayer adjustment
IN InformationInformationPayer adjustmentPayer adjustment
PA Provider AdjustmentProvider AdjustmentProvider adjustmentProvider adjustment
PR Processing ResultProcessing ResultPayer adjustmentPayer adjustment

name: AdjustmentCategory
title: adjustmentCategory
description: Code system of concepts used to specify the category of adjustment and is used to assist in determining which table is used for Adjustment Reason.  Used in the Adjustment (ADJ) segment in HL7 Version 2.x messaging.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0564 (Adjustment Category Code)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
